plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is action. The movies all have fast-paced plots with lots of action and violence. The musical scores are all intense and match the mood of the movie. The mood of the musical score is usually intense and fast-paced. The settings are all urban and modern. The visual style is usually dark and gritty. The writing style is usually fast-paced and action-oriented. The runtime is usually around 2 hours. The themes are usually about justice, revenge, and heroism.
